item.summary: SQLClientHBaseITCase.testHBase failed with "ArgumentError: wrong number of arguments (0 for 1)"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Thanks for the report.

The test failed in JDK11 profile, the reason is we only support HBase 1.4.3 which is not supported JDK11
I'd like to fix this, dian.fu could help assign the ticket to me ?

[1] https://hbase.apache.org/book.html#basic.prerequisites
[2] https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-22972
Leonard Xu Thanks for taking this issue. Have assigned this issue to you.
